String.string: This is an opportunity we can't pass up.
This victory could win us the catacombs!
Enter the {@Rgn:9018001$$Argon Catacombs} through the teleportal and report to {@LinkCreature:418#2003#Arigma}.
Hunt down and slay {@LinkCreature:418#1031#Sarmamos} in the {@Rgn:9018001$$Argon Catacombs}.
Hunt down and slay {@LinkCreature:418#1041#Meharmat} of the {@Rgn:9018001$$Argon Catacombs}.
